title: K-12 Artificial Intelligence Education: Role-Playing Game-Based Project Learning for Language Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Experiential process of developing language-processing AI models through individual device utilization and team-based collaborative projects.

learning_goals: Learners can recreate the data collection-representation-reasoning-optimization process of NLP-based AI models through a role-playing game.
Learners can explain the optimization principles of machine learning models through a graph-based loss function minimization simulation.
Based on an understanding of AI decision-making processes, learners can develop language domain application cases (e.g., chatbots, translators).

resources: NLP Dataset (Movie Reviews, News Articles, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
